thread.section_title: Holiday Inn Paris Gare de Lyon Bastille - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Express Breakfast a great idea
thread.title_full: Express Breakfast a great idea - Review of Holiday Inn Paris Gare de Lyon Bastille, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Beirniad
title: Express Breakfast a great idea
text: The hotel remains our favourite overnight stop for onward travel via Gare de Lyon. It has recently introduced an Express Breakfast, which is really just a light breakfast - ideal for those who do not want to pay a small fortune for food they are not going to eat.
